resources.string: In todays scenario, womens violence increasing particularly for intimate partner violence and sexual violence. In order to overcome this situation Gsafe community helps to reduce these violence by notifying friends and family members by sending surrounding audio and location of victim (current location, audio will be send every one minute and two minute respectively).
After create account/signUp, You need to follow these steps given below-
First, Click on add contacts, Select desired contacts(who will get notification when you will be in trouble) which will shown in SOS Contacts
When you want to notify your SOS Contacts, Go To profile section, And switch on Activate SOS option
By doing this, SOS service will be activated.
When you are in trouble/emergency, Double click on volume button and phone will be vibrate.

ul.li: Your screen light should be on while pressing volume button
Your current sms pack is applicable for performing these activities i.e- location and audio links.

resources.string: After this activity, Your current location will be sent to your SOS Contacts and audio recording will start for 20 seconds. These activities repeat after one minute and two minute respectively.

We are accessing following permissions from users for performing SOS functionality, All these information are kept secured under Gsafe community, We do not disclose these information with third parties apps and Gsafe do not use any third parties apps and library.

ul.li: Sending this location to SOS Contacts in foreground/background.
When SOS activities are performing in foreground.
Write location and audio links in text.
Send SOS message to SOS Contacts, When SOS activities are performing in background.
Read the contents of your shared SOS messages.
Use volume button for performing activities i.e- audio and location.
Vibrating your phone when volume button pressed twice.
Internet connection should be available to perform all activities.

resources.string: Read instruction carefully from Help section
Switch on Activate SOS only when you are in trouble, Switch off when you are not using SOS Service.
